text: Im Sa-hong (임사홍, 1445 - 1506) was a politician and writer and member of the royal family in Joseon Dynasty Korea. == Related pages == * Shin Su-geun * Nam Gon == References == == Other websites == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=130494 * http://100.daum.net/encyclopedia/view.do?docid=b18a1740a Category:1445 births Category:1506 deaths Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean writers
title: Im Sa-hong
